title: The Mis-adventures of a Teenage Mark
description: This book is no longer available. Thank you to all who downloaded and enjoyed it. ~MarkBack some twenty-five years ago, in the heady days of my teenage youth, I had a best friend named Sean. We did everything together, but most of the time we spent our time at the beach body surfing or boogie boarding, especially during the long, hot summer breaks of school holidays.
author: Mark Alders
